SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_GETVALIDPRIMARYEMAILADDRESS
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the primary email address of a constituent if it is okay to use
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_GETVALIDPRIMARYEMAILADDRESS ( @constituentID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns nvarchar(100) with execute as caller as begin declare @solicitCode_DoNotEmail nvarchar(100) = 'Do not email' declare @emailAddress nvarchar(100) = ''
select @emailAddress = EMAILADDRESS from dbo.V_QUERY_CONSTITUENTEMAILADDRESS email where email.CONSTITUENTID = @constituentID and ISPRIMARY = 1 and DONOTEMAIL = 0 and BOUNCED = 0 and not exists (select CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE.ID from dbo.CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE join dbo.SOLICITCODE on CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE.SOLICITCODEID=SOLICITCODE.ID where (lower (SOLICITCODE.DESCRIPTION) = lower (@solicitCode_DoNotEmail)) and (CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE.CONSTITUENTID = @constituentID))
return @emailAddress end
